practice_phrases: You have been learning Chinese
你学中文
You are learning Chinese now
你现在学中文
You have been learning Chinese well
你学中文学得好
I have been learning Chinese too
我也学中文
You have been learning Chinese with me
你和我学中文
You have been learning Chinese before this
你之前学中文
You have been learning Chinese as soon as possible
你尽快学中文
You have been learning Chinese with me for a while
你和我学中文学了一会儿
I wanted to know if you have been learning Chinese
我想知道你学中文
You have been learning Chinese because you wanted to speak
你学中文因为你想说话

lego: have been learning for how long
practice_phrases: Have been learning for how long
学了多久了
You have been learning Chinese for how long
你学中文学了多久了
I have been learning for how long now
我学了多久了现在
You have been speaking Chinese for how long
你说中文学了多久了
You have been learning Chinese with me for how long
你和我学中文学了多久了
I have been asking how long you have been learning
我问你学了多久了
You have been learning Chinese for how long before tonight
你今晚之前学中文学了多久了
I wanted to know how long you have been learning Chinese
我想知道你学中文学了多久了
You have been learning Chinese for how long with your friend
你和你朋友学中文学了多久了
I asked you yesterday how long you have been learning Chinese
我昨天问你学中文学了多久了
